Ghost of the Ancient Railroad Engineer:
Oh, wow! I can't hold it! I can't hold it! I thought I could hold at least this hammer if nothing else! My own good hammer, and I have no hand to hold it... Well, there is nothing I can do about it. My last hope is dashed. All I can do is wait here for Shilen's call... One last favor, living ones could you please go to the Trolley Ruins and meet my friend for me? I am too weak to go see him now.
(The hammer falls right through his hand onto the ground. It breaks with a thud.)
